page.title: 12Employment
page.content: { We have virtually no unemployment. Family farms dominate: there's only 1 farm manager & 5 farm workers. Employed in farming related jobs are:- 1 cattle breeding technician, 1 milk records supervisor, 5 at the local hatchery, 2 self employed agricultural contractors & 1 farm building erector. Small businesses are:- Funeral direc- tors & Builders,2 motor mechanics and 1 Builder,Carpenter,electrician, haulage contractor,hair dresser, beau- tician, publican and 1 post mistress. The{supermarket 5km away provides {part time jobs,}3 women work there. In recent years people have moved into the area & have varied work :- British Telecom, Forestry, Industrial Therapy manager, Wall paper designer, author, marine engineer & surveyor. There is a doctor,1 nurse and 3 nursing auxillaries and 3 teachers.
